column2: Competency Question (CQ) / Natural language sentence (fact) (FA)
column3: Answer [for questions only]
column4: IRI of MBCO most relevant classes/properties

column2: What are the main properties of the electrode?
column3: surface chemical composition ; surface area ; conductivity ; surface hydrophilicity ; exchange current rate ; tortuosity ;  porosity ; surface stability (towards modifications)

column2: What are the main properties of the electrolyte?
column3: Composition (salts; solvents); purity; transport properties (viscosity; ionic conductivity); mass density

column2: What are the major time scales for process industry? (to classify various types of DTs)
column3: Industrial safety ; intermediate; planning

column2: What are the main components of a RFB?
column3: Bipolar plates; Membranes; Carbon felt; Electrolyte

column2: What are the main components of a LiB/NiB?
column3: Active material ; Binder ; Percolant ; Slurry solvent; Electrode; Separator; Electrolyte; Collector; Battery cell; Casing; Coating layer; Full cell

column2: What are the high-level types of optimization problems that can benefit from logic-based approaches?
column3: Scheduling (e.g. of maintenance); Allocation of resources (e.g. machines/humans for tasks); Compatibility checks (e.g. between materials); Compliance (e.g. of a process with regulation); Process design (e.g. simulation / experiment); Process sequence validation (e.g. that the ordering of sub-processes does not break dependencies)

column2: What are the main scales for processes in RFB?
column3: Molecular scale; Fiber scale; Pore scale; Cell scale; Stack scale; Battery system scale; Energy system scale

column2: Materials incompatibilities need to be pointed out (e.g. mixtures that are unsafe)
column3: n/a - fact

column2: What method is used to process the raw data (and obtain processed data)?
column3: Conversion; extraction; incomplete dataset removal; incomplete dataset padding

column2: What types of data quality evaluation methods (checks/guarantees) are available within BatCAT?
column3: Human assessment ; Quality insurance procedures (e.g. regular calibration checks) ; Automated repeatability tests

column2: What is the average value and error of property X over a certain set?
column3: n/a - case-specific

column2: What methods are available in BatCAT to quantify uncertainties in general?
column3: Error propagation ; Error estimate via statistical methods

column2: What are the high-level types of characterization needed for RFB or LiB?
column3: Electrochemical characterization; Physicochemical characterization; Rheological characterization

column2: A characterization technique involves a sample + some instrument (characterization device) and evaluates (as output) some physical quantities
What are the main properties of a sensor?
column3: type/measured variable ; connection type (WIFI/Bluethooth; Optical fiber; wired electrical cable)

column2: What are the sensor types for on-line characterization of LIB?
column3: Accelerometer;  Temperature sensor (Thermocouple); vibration sensor; Gas-detection sensor (CO / CO2 sensor); Power sensor (Power monitoring clip); pressure sensor

column2: What are the main (manufacturing) quantities to monitor (process KPIs)?
column3: Energy consumption; Equipment performance; Waste produced (amount); Product quality

column2: What are the main ordered steps in the LIB/NIB manufacturing process?
column3: Mixing ; Coating ; Drying ; Calendering ; Cutting ; Assemblying ; Filling ; Forming ; Degassing

column2: What are the main ordered steps in the RFB manufacturing process?
column3: Stack assembly ; Stack compression ; Stack sealing (glueing) ; Tanks assemblying

column2: What are the variables to evaluate (=process KPIs) the LIB/NIB manufacturing process?
column3: Scrap rate; Production cost per unit

column2: What are the variables to evaluate (=process KPIs) the RFB manufacturing process?
column3: Production performance; Production cost per unit; Throughput failure rate

column2: What are the LIB/NIB battery product main properties (KPIs)?
column3: Full cell Initial performance; Full cell Ageing; Full cell Safety

column2: What are the RFB battery product main properties (KPIs)?
column3: Full cell efficiency ; Full cell Capacity ; Full cell Durability

column2: What are the main electrochemical components in LiB/NiB manufacturing processes?
column3: Active material ; Binder ; Percolant ; Slurry solvent; Electrode; Separator; Electrolyte; Collector; Battery cell; Casing; Coating layer; Full cell
